attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister Brown, you were not elected. Both this years and last years budget are penalising the poorest earners, and the response to criticism has been a closed shop. Respectfully, Prime Minister, we ask you to let us, the citizens and residents, choose, democratically and immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
